price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Iganira kandi abantu warungitsweko ku nkuru ya Ismayili (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) iri muri Qor’ani; mu vy’ukuri, Ismayili yari imvugakuri ishitsa ivyo yiyemeje, yari n’Intumwa akaba n’Umuvugishwamana.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
